messages.body: We need to decide on our meeting schedule for next quarter
I think weekly meetings might be too frequent given our workload
What about bi-weekly? That gives us regular touchpoints without being overwhelming
Bi-weekly sounds good to me. We could do Tuesdays
I like the bi-weekly idea. Tuesdays work for me too
Perfect, so bi-weekly on Tuesdays. Should we set a standard time?
How about 2pm? That avoids the lunch rush
